neurotools.operators.gaussian1DblurOperator(n, sigma)[source]¶

Returns a 1D Gaussan blur operator of size n

neurotools.operators.gaussian2DblurOperator(n, sigma)[source]¶

Returns a 2D Gaussan blur operator for a n x n sized domain Constructed as a tensor product of two 1d blurs of size n
